name: Grim Facade: Mystery of Venice Collector’s Edition
description: Two young ladies have gone missing and it’s up to you to find them in Grim Façade: Mystery of Venice, a fun Hidden Object game!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Windows Vista/Windows 8 Processor: 1.4 GHz Memory: 1280 MB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 763 MB available space
